landing_page.intro-bar: Be the difference in your comunity with Resource Sync

card1.title: Connect
card1.paragraph: Link up with friends and neighbors around town, or connect with your social media pages to show the world you care about community.

card2.title: Local
card2.paragraph: We keep things local, from small businesses to the little old lady down the street. Show your pride in your town, your way.

card3.title: Reach Out
card3.paragraph: Need help? Simply create a solicitor account and let the town know what you need! We make it easy to find the right resources in your own backyard.

call-to-action.title: Connect with your community now
call-to-action.paragraph: We understand the need for community involvement in this day and age, we also understand that it can be difficult to find someone to help, or somewhere that needs help. Thatâ€™s where we come in, connecting member's of the community with those in need. From dog-walking to paving and everything in between. Resource-Sync makes it as easy to give back or get the resources you need.
